tagline.title: BALI SPA AND DINNER TOUR IS A SPECIAL BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY BALINESE SPA AND FRESH SEAFOOD DINNER AT JIMBARAN BAY BEACH
tagline.text: BALI SPA AND DINNER TOUR IS A SPECIAL BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY BALINESE SPA AND FRESH SEAFOOD DINNER AT JIMBARAN BAY BEACHT
tagline.html: BALI SPA AND DINNER TOUR IS A SPECIAL BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY BALINESE SPA AND FRESH SEAFOOD DINNER AT JIMBARAN BAY BEACHT

description.text: Bali Spa and Dinner Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages that we offer for you after you do some trip in bali, its combination betwen balinese spa and fresh seafood dinner. Bali Spa and Dinner Tour will enjoy visiting places of interest such as Visit Bali Spa for having two hours spa massage consist of 1 hour balinese massage and 1 hour spa with professional spa therapis and continue visiting Jimbaran Bay Beach is traditional fishing village which famous for delicious seafood food, along the beach there are plenty of seafood restaurant you can choose. Bali Spa and Dinner Tour will bring you to the wonderful memory with two different experiences as the feature of this package. Our professional Bali Tours Driver is always outstanding offer our best services to keep your convenience trip along with private full air-conditioning car transfer to complete your enjoyable on Bali Spa and Dinner Tour. Below is shor description of Touris destination we will be visit during Bali Spa and Dinner Tour.

title.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Spa and Dinner Tour

image.title: Bali Spa and Dinner Tour | Bali Spa Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Enjoy 2 hours Bali Spa massage and It consist of herbs and spices that we wrapped tightly in muslin or cotton and then push in hot water or steam my be placed on various part of the body to relief shore muscles, stimulate circulation and refresh the skin. With a professional and experience Spa theraphists in your treatment will give you and excellent therapy care for refresh your mind and body. bali spa is very good for you to make your blod circle relaxing and will make you fresh. Never missed this chance to make during your holiday in Bali islands.

button.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Spa and Dinner Tour

title.title: Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach | Bali Spa and Dinner Tour

image.title: Bali Spa and Dinner Tour | Bali Jimbaran Beach Dinner | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Jimbaran Beach is just small fishing village which people work as a sailor and now is getting famous for the centre of Seafood Dinner with delicious food and fresh from the sailor around the village. Is a beautiful beach located in the Jimbaran Village at southern part of Bali Islands with white sand unfolding along the coastal. There are plenty of cafes offer delicious of seafood dinner with breathtaking view of Indian Ocean . Seafood Dinner served right on the beach with beautiful table set up apposite to the ocean. Feel the romatic seafood dinner in front of beach with amazing feature such Balinese dancing performance during the Dinner.

price.title: Bali Spa and Dinner Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Spa and Dinner Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,000,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 750,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 700,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 650,000/person

Note : Get Special price for group booking

Bali Spa and Dinner Tour Price Include :

  • Private transfer with good and cool A/C car
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • 2 Hours Spa Packages
  • Set Dinner Seafood Menu at Jimbaran Beach
  • Mineral Water

content.event: 2 Hours Spa and Massage Packages
Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
